overview: Check out this new theme that is simple shift in energy and location, but really makes a HUGE impact. ChaosMen wanted the room to be white so it would drop away, making the focus just on the action. They also added a lot of body oil. The models that have amazing bodies, really have been getting-off to the muscle-worship it inspires.  Contains the scenes: Cruz and Glenn; Solomon and Theon; Santoro and Vander; Jordan and Tatum; Aries, Bay, Glenn and Vander; Aiden and Cruz; Aiden and Theon; and Bentley and Solomon.
title: Pure: Volume 1
